test-method.name: loadDefinitionsUrl
test-method.description: registry loads operations in custom definitions file

test-method.name: overwriteFile
test-method.description: if 'to' points to an existent file, this file is overwritten with the original's content

test-method.name: copySingleFileToExistentDirectory
test-method.description: if 'to' points to an existent directory, the file is copied with the original's base name

test-method.name: failsIfFromDoensNotExist
test-method.description: if 'from' doesn't exist and it isn't in registered outputs and checkFrom is true, action fails

test-method.name: copySingleFile
test-method.description: if 'to' points to an inexistent file, the original file is copied to this path

test-method.name: definitionsAreCreated
test-method.description: DefinitionsFile contains correct mapping for actions and operations

test-method.name: appendContent
test-method.description: content is appended to the file

test-method.name: zipAndUnzip
test-method.description: zip archiver and expander components test

test-method.name: zipDirectory
test-method.description: the given directory is zipped to the destination file

test-method.name: unzipArchive
test-method.description: the given archive is unzipped to destination

test-method.name: operationLoading
test-method.description: OperationClosureDelegate loads operation data through missingMethod
